column5: Entire 3 bedroom/2 full bath home in a quiet neighborhood. Third bedroom area furnished for office space for work/communication. Large driveway with private parking for 6 vehicles or RV. 5 Miles to IAH, family activities, some great restaurants. Blocks from US 59, NE Medical Center/Kingwood Medical Center. Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families. **Mondays and Thursdays are blocked for bookings - NOTE: these nights, I can often make exceptions for extended stays.**
column8: Entire home 5 Miles From IAH Blocks from Hwy 59/69
